text: Ama koros kinni addunyâ mano akeerâ manok doorittaah muxxussam, usun sinam Yallih gitih (islaam diinih gita kinnuk) katayyuk waasaanaah ken nafsi elle faxa innal ama giti makot yan gita yakkem kaak faxan, too maray tama weeloolat weeloysime cakki gitak makot yaniih, tirtol ken xayyossu haytaamak xeeroonuh
